title: Road Rage
description: One race across town changed Eric Thomas’ life forever. Now, he must continue to race if he wants to keep his family alive. Powerful men have taken his life hostage for their own entertainment, and the only way to regain freedom is to play by their rules. He has become a pawn in a deadly game where losing may kill him, and winning may require him to kill someone else. A hidden force begins to work, changing the odds in Eric’s favor. Will it be enough to save him and his family?
author: Mark  Tompkins
